name: The Niketan
description: Material UI based on this project’s key feature is Admin Panel with Admin Route. Admin can add more admin, can delete and add products, can delete or process bookings. Another feature is Dashboard which appears after login. For Admin and Users, there are different dashboards in the same route. From the dashboard, users can book products, user can modify bookings, and so on.
technologies: React JS, React Router, Node JS, Express JS, Material UI, Firebase Authentication, JWT Token, MongoDB

name: The Wayfarers
description: Bootstrap-based this Project’s Key feature is Admin Dashboard. Admin can add products, and modify users’ booking. Another feature is, users can book products from the booking page and can modify from my booking and offcanvas page, and the result would happen in real-time from the database
technologies: React JS, React Router, Node JS, Express JS, Bootstrap, Firebase Authentication, MongoDB

name: Z Care
description: Bootstrap-based this project's key feature is Firebase Authentication System. Another feature is the Private Route. No one can’t enter private pages without login. React router and hash router are the rest of the most remarkable features of this project
technologies: React JS, React Router, Bootstrap, Firebase Authentication, MongoDB

name: Dev Mentors'
description: Bootstrap-based this single page project's key feature is react Router. Along with that, common header and footer is also another feature.
